## TransactableLiquity.registerFrontend() method

Register current wallet address as a Liquity frontend.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerFrontend(kickbackRate: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  kickbackRate | [Decimalish](./arth-base.decimalish.md) | The portion of MAHA rewards to pass onto users of the frontend (between 0 and 1). |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./arth-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.
